Description: A short description of what the "nano swarm" tool is used for. I.e. it can be used to weaken enemies or to strengthen allies (teammates.)

French.Translation:
Affaiblit les ennemis
Renforce les alliés

Italian.Translation:
Indebolisce i nemici
Rinforza gli alleati

Spanish.Translation:
Debilita a los enemigos
Fortalece a los aliados

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation:
Enfraquece os inimigos
Fortalece os aliados

Japanese.Translation:
敵弱体化
仲間強化

Chinese_Traditional.Translation:
削弱敵人
增強盟友

Chinese_Simplified.Translation:
弱化敌人
强化队友

name: GearCategory.NanoSwarmDescription
